channel.description: CC 410 - Week 9 This Week Parallel Programming Parallel Example Event-Driven Programming Event Driven Example Restaurant Milestone 7 Milestone 7 GUI Events Refine GUI Structure - Tree Add Button Click Handlers (Mostly) Functional GUI Some Unit Tests Read the Hints!
